Articles.Content:
Is there anyway to view parts that are deployable in their deployed state? I want to do this to avoid clipping, etc. The ladders are deployed when you add them but nothing else is, such as the foldable sat-dish, landing legs etc.

Anyway I can view them deployed without having to go to the launch pad?
Thanks for the quick reply. No biggie I reckon just a minor nuisance.

Is there anyway to view parts that are deployable in their deployed state? I want to do this to avoid clipping, etc. The ladders are deployed when you add them but nothing else is, such as the foldable sat-dish, landing legs etc.

Anyway I can view them deployed without having to go to the launch pad?

Just head out to the launch pad.
